mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, email, password, name, nickname, phone_number, gender, age, location, photo, authority, level, wish, introduction) VALUES (#{id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone_number}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{location}, #{photo}, #{authority}, #{level}, #{wish}, #{introduction})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member m JOIN market mk ON (m.id = mk.id) WHERE m.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM jmstate js JOIN member m ON js.jm_id = m.id JOIN market mk ON js.jm_service = mk.service_no WHERE m.id = #{id}
